page.title: 18SYMONDSBURY COLLEGE
page.content:
The {College}building was built in {Tudor}times. It started 7 years ago. They have got 50 students and teach each one individually. The two most inportant people they have had there are{Addy the Prince of Nigeria}and {Marquis of Bath's grandaughter.
He has 20 teaching staff and the age of the students are 16_20 years. Mr. Hitchen, the Principal, chose the place because the area is large as well as quiet. The college teaches all G.C.E. subjects to "A"level.
The{Secretarial College}opens in {September 1985}and there will be a one year foundation course.
